title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Beat eggs and mix with Parmesan.
Drain pasta and quickly toss with pancetta, egg mixture, and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a buttery and creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices, then grill until cooked.
Fry onions and spices until fragrant.
Stir in cream and grilled chicken.
Cook until sauce thickens and serve with rice.
